ygData.messageBody:
Last night I was doing Seafuries in OOT with a full party. We had a shaman who was using Togors to slow them in every battle. After a couple of hours, the shaman had to go and the slow responsibility became that of the enchanter in the party. At that time we had changed over to include 2 mages, an enchanter, a druid and me, the mages and the enchanter each with pets. Since my songs don't work on pets, I scrapped curtails (malise was more then enough), celerity (effects only me), chant (effects only me), for mana song only... For the heck of it, I decided to mem up binding which I really haven't used since maybe 21rst level. Next thing I know everyone is asking who is slowing the cyclops. Everyone was pleasantly surprised to find out it was me. I know the shaman slow downs vs. the bard are well documented. Has anyone ever compared the enchanter line of spells in this regard to the bard?




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
